description:
Divide and conquer - it’s a train ride to terror!  A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz’s new duelists separate Yugi from Jonouchi in order to capture their souls separately!  Stuck in the middle of nowhere, can Jonouchi win without Yugi’s support against ranks of ravaging raptors? And can Yugi, in his greatest moment of weakness, pull himself together before he joins the other lost souls by taking the last train to oblivion?
Source: crunchyroll
